title: find
description: Check if an element exists with the specified CSS selector.

css.description: CSS selector that uniquely identified the element.

wait.description: Pause before performing the next action.

duration.description: Seconds to wait. If `css` is set, the maximum duration to wait for the element to become available.

matchText.description: Check if an element displays the expected text.

text.description: Text that the element should display.

moveMouse.description: Move the mouse to an element specified by a CSS sepector. Only runs if a test is being recorded.

alignH.description: Horizantal alignment of the mouse to the element.

alignV.description: Vertical alignment of the mouse to the element.

offsetX.description: Number of pixels to offset the mouse along the X axis, relative to the element center. Positive values offset to the right. Negative values offset to the left.

offsetY.description: Number of pixels to offset the mouse along the Y axis, relative to the element center. Positive values offset to the top. Negative values offset to the bottom.

click.description: Click an element specified by a CSS sepector.

alignH.description: Horizantal alignment of the mouse to the element.

alignV.description: Vertical alignment of the mouse to the element.

offsetX.description: Number of pixels to offset the mouse along the X axis, relative to the element center. Positive values offset to the right. Negative values offset to the left.

offsetY.description: Number of pixels to offset the mouse along the Y axis, relative to the element center. Positive values offset to the top. Negative values offset to the bottom.

type.description: Click an element specified by a CSS sepector.

trailingSpecialKey.description: Special key pressed after the 'keys' value, if present. Supported values: https://github.com/puppeteer/puppeteer/blob/main/src/common/USKeyboardLayout.ts

env.description: Path to a `.env` file to load before performing the action.
